lines.text: Lemme tell you buttholes somethin'! This shit's wwaaayyyyy outta line! And you squirrels better have some nuts in your mouth... or you're goin' downtown!

[after tasting the punch, which the Knights have urinated in]
It does have a little wang to it. Good, though.
Did you ever hear the joke about the man with five penises? His pants fit like a glove.
I've had this taste in my mouth before.
[Dudley is calling his mother from Tubby's]
Mother?
Dudley?
Mother, I am calling you to tell you I will be out rather late tonight. In point of fact, I might not be in at all.
You're not in bed, dear?
Mother, I have a assignation with a young lady. I am going to explore the boundaries of my manhood. Mother, I am going to get laid.
You're going to be late, dear?
Not late, mother, laid; the past participle of the verb 'to lay'. Mother, I am going to screw someone.
Oh!
[faints]
Now, I just have to figure out how.

[Opens front door to find a bag on fire]
Oh my god! Nevans! Juanita!
I'll take care of it!
[Steps on the bag finding it contains dog poop]
It's dog shit!

[Calling her from the street]
Oh, Mrs. Freidman.

[Notices one of the occupants is mooning her]
I'll kill you! I'll kill you all!Juanita! JUanita, get out here!
Turk, did you come?
A little.
A little? What do you mean a little? Either you came or you didn't come. Did you come or not?
I came.
Oh my God, I'm so embarrassed.
Don't you think I'd look good in a moustache?
You'd be perfect. You'd be a perfect horse's ass.

[Wearing a wolf mask]
Hey, Red Riding Hood, wanna be eaten by the Big, Bad Wolf?
Fuck you Newbomb.
[repeated line to a little boy]
You little son of a bitch!
[Sally's friends are topless sunbathing by the pool]
I don't know why you're doing that. The last time I did that my tits peeled so much I went from a B cup to an A.
Don't hurt me! I think I may be a bleeder!
Everything changes, you know that. Nothing stays the same.
I mean, I don't know what it's gonna be. Soon I'll be going away to college and I'll probably never see you again.
You're going to UCLA.
You know what I'd like to do to you, Newbomb? I'd like to kick the crap out of you!
How about a kiss?
Sure, those never cost anything.
Yes they did. I got used to them.

[Tape played over the PA system at the dance]
Did you hear about Jean Freidman? I heard she had an abortion in Tijuana.
That's doesn't surprise me. I heard she gave half the football team the clap.
[chuckles]
They sure played like they still had it last week.
That was the 'Ironbox' Twins, Brenda and Shirley Weintraub, coming to you live from the ladies' room at Tubby's Drive-In.

[Speaking to a crowd of investors in her living room]
Starting tomorrow, today is history...

[Overheard speaking to Officer Clark from the kitchen]
HORSESHIT!
Um, Nevans, there seems to be some sort of disturbance in the kitchen.
Um, yes, those are members of the Hollywood Police Dept.
Oh, well... go take care of it.

[heard from the kitchen, screaming at Officer Clark]
BULLSHIT!
I'll go see if I can't get those boys to calm down.

[singing to the theme of Lawrence of Arabia]
Lawrence, Lawrence of Arabia. He was an English Guy. He came to fight the Turkish.

[looking at Jimmy Shines newly finished hot rod, joking]
Is this piss yellow?

[with mock shock]
It's 'Tony Nancy' yellow!

[to Duke at a traffic light]
OK asshole, pull this yellow piece of shit around the corner here... you got me? Hear that? Move it!... Right now, asshole!
[Duke dumps the clutch and burns away from the traffic stop, leaving Clark looking confused]

[yells out the window of his GTO as they pass Clark still in the street]
Hey Officer Clark, are you lost or something?

[to Newbomb, who's back is turned]
Hey pencil-dick... what time is it?

[grabs a sandwich to throw at Simpson]
Time to eat!
[turns and hurls the sandwich which hits Officer Bimbeau instead]
Man, the fool ain't got no dick at all
Turk, come over here. Now he happens to be very hysterically funny. I put him right up there with Steve and Edie. He has more talent in his little pinkie than you have in your whole... pinky.
We're going to... to go to... to Watts at two o'clock in the morning? Let's go!

[During the cheerleader routine in the gym, the PomPom Girl in the middle's skirt flies up showing that she isn't wearing underwear, flashing both sides to the shock/delight of the crowd]
You forgot your underwear. Your underwear!
[PomPom Girl realizes what she's done and runs off in fear and shame]
